flavorText: Sometimes the most radical thing you can do is think inside the box.

foreignData.flavorText: Querdenken ist manchmal nicht radikal genug.
foreignData.name: Quadrieren
foreignData.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl hat Basis-Stärke und -Widerstandskraft 4/4 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.flavorText: A veces, lo más radical que puedes hacer es tener una actitud cuadriculada.
foreignData.name: Cuadrar
foreignData.text: La criatura objetivo tiene una fuerza y resistencia base de 4/4 hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Parfois, ne montrer aucune originalité est ce qu'il y a de plus radical.
foreignData.name: Élever au carré
foreignData.text: Une créature ciblée a une force et une endurance de base de 4/4 jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: A volte la cosa più radicale che tu possa fare è pensare dentro gli schemi.
foreignData.name: Quadrare il Cerchio
foreignData.text: Una creatura bersaglio ha forza e costituzione base 4/4 fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 型にはめて考えることが、最も過激な手段となることもある。
foreignData.name: 四角の構え
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それの基本のパワーとタフネスは４/４になる。

foreignData.flavorText: 이따금 당신이 할 수 있는 가장 급진적인 일은 상자 안에서 생각하는 것이다.
foreignData.name: 맞서기
foreignData.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 기본 공격력과 방어력이 4/4가 된다.

foreignData.flavorText: Às vezes, a coisa mais radical que você pode fazer é pensar dentro da caixa.
foreignData.name: Enquadrar
foreignData.text: A criatura alvo tem poder e resistência básicos 4/4 até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Иногда самое радикальное, что ты можешь сделать, это держать себя в рамках.
foreignData.name: Боевая Стойка
foreignData.text: Целевое существо имеет базовую силу и выносливость 4/4 до конца хода.

foreignData.flavorText: 有时候规圆矩方，便是你能作到的最出格事情。
foreignData.name: 四方阵势
foreignData.text: 目标生物的基础力量与防御力为4/4直到回合结束。

foreignData.flavorText: 有時候規圓矩方，便是你能作到的最出格事情。
foreignData.name: 四方陣勢
foreignData.text: 目標生物的基礎力量與防禦力為4/4直到回合結束。

name: Square Up
originalText: Target creature has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn.

rulings.text: Square Up overwrites all previous effects that set the target creature’s power and toughness to specific values. Other effects that set its power or toughness to specific values that start to apply after Square Up resolves will overwrite this effect.

Any effects that modify a creature’s power and/or toughness without setting them to a specific value (i.e. ones that don’t affect base power and/or toughness) will apply after its base power and toughness are set, regardless of the order those effects were created. The same is true for counters that modify its power and toughness.

text: Target creature has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn.
